# iosxr_radius_source_interface (Resource)

This resource can manage the Radius Source Interface configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_radius_source_interface" "example" {
  vrf              = "VRF1"
  source_interface = "Loopback0"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `source_interface` (String) Specify interface for source address in RADIUS packets
- `vrf` (String) VRF for this source interface configuration

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_radius_source_interface.example "<vrf>"
```
